author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/3346

removed suggestions that these were not valid

organized verbs to be in alphabetical order to make it easier to compare against
(unfortunately, the diff viewer on GitHub isn't so smart about lines that were moved, easier to review the individual commits)
https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms714428(VS.85).aspx

Created doc bug to update above link https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell-Docs/issues/1630

<!--

If you are a PowerShell Team member, please make sure you choose the Reviewer(s) and Assignee for your PR.
If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

-->

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @markekraus can you `Approve` if you're ok with the changes?  Thanks!

title: added new approved Build and Deploy verbs
